arts.ttl: Tottenham injury latest as Thomas Frank shares major blow before Aston Villa clash
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur host Aston Villa in the Premier League on Sunday afternoon, and Thomas Frank could be without as many as six players for the visit of Unai Emery's side

arts.ttl: Ollie Watkins update as Unai Emery delivers injury news ahead of Tottenham clash

arts.ttl: Tottenham Hotspur v Aston Villa: predicted line-up, team news and match preview
arts.sum: The world’s most famous football team will play their first Premier League fixture after the October international break when they visit Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday afternoon. Aston Villa are the talk of the town. arts.ttl: Watkins fit for Spurs clash as Buendia, Sancho return and Villa sweat on Mings
arts.sum: Unai Emery expects Ollie Watkins to start v Tottenham after a leg knock, while Emi Buendia and Jadon Sancho are back in training. Tyrone Mings still faces a late check on fitness.
